column1: commit-latency-avg 	The average time taken for a commit request 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
commit-latency-max 	The max time taken for a commit request 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
commit-rate 	The number of commit calls per second 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
assigned-partitions 	The number of partitions currently assigned to this consumer 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
heartbeat-response-time-max 	The max time taken to receive a response to a heartbeat request 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
heartbeat-rate 	The average number of heartbeats per second 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
join-time-avg 	The average time taken for a group rejoin 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
join-time-max 	The max time taken for a group rejoin 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
join-rate 	The number of group joins per second 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
sync-time-avg 	The average time taken for a group sync 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
sync-time-max 	The max time taken for a group sync 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
sync-rate 	The number of group syncs per second 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
last-heartbeat-seconds-ago 	The number of seconds since the last controller heartbeat 	kafka.consumer:type=consumer-coordinator-metrics
